sentences.english: The pathogenic biological characteristics of Sessileflower acanthopanax root rot was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对短梗五加根腐病病原菌进行了生物学特性研究。

sentences.english: Its pathogen has been isolated, proved by the rule of Koch and identified as Corynespora viticis Guo f.
sentences.chinese: 病原菌经分离和柯赫氏法则验证，为一种棒孢属真菌。

sentences.english: Miejunxing hardly have no effects on pathogen.
sentences.chinese: 灭菌星对病原菌几乎没有抑制作用。

sentences.english: Vibrio parahaemolyticus is an important microorganism pathogen for food intoxication cases.
sentences.chinese: 副溶血性弧菌是食物中毒的重要病原菌。

sentences.english: Crown rust is the common name both of a serious leaf-rust disease of oats and of the causal agent.
sentences.chinese: 冠锈病是燕麦的一种严重的叶锈病和病原菌。

sentences.english: To survey the composition and drug resistance of pathogenic bacteria from the wounds of bone trauma patients with infected wounds.
sentences.chinese: 调查骨伤患者伤口感染病原菌的构成及其耐药情况。

sentences.english: The results showed that the main pathogens caused postharvest decay of "Li" jujube were Rhizopus stoloniter and Alternaria spp.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，侵染梨枣的病原菌主要有根霉和交链孢。

sentences.english: Conclusion Mycoplasma is one of the main pathogenic bacteria that can cause NGU.
sentences.chinese: 结论支原体是引起NGU的主要病原菌之一。

sentences.english: The original infection pathogen was mainly in twigs.
sentences.chinese: 小枝中的病原菌为黑斑病主要初侵染来源。

sentences.english: Fusarium moniliforme is one pathogeny of wheat common rot.
sentences.chinese: 串珠镰刀菌是小麦根腐病病原菌之一。

sentences.english: Some pathogenic bacteria resulted in nosocomial infection were prevented and controlled after hand-washing of nurses.
sentences.chinese: 手卫生后一些导致医院感染的病原菌污染被有效控制。

sentences.english: Pathogen effectors are virulence factors causing plant diseases.
sentences.chinese: 病原菌的效应分子是导致植物发病的毒性因子。

sentences.english: Conclutions The virulence of Y. pestis from plague nature foci is moderate.
sentences.chinese: 结论河北省鼠疫自然疫源地病原菌毒力属于中等毒力。

sentences.english: Campylobacter jejuni is recognized as one of the major causes of human food-borne diseases.
sentences.chinese: 空肠弯曲菌是引起人类食源性疾病的主要病原菌之一。

sentences.english: The genetic relationship between Ralstonia solanacearum and host was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了病原菌与寄主相互作用中的遗传关系。

sentences.english: Conclusion Vibrio Alginolyticus was the germ which caused the food- poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 结论溶藻弧菌是本次食物中毒的病原菌。
